wikipedia_page.main: Spencer Smith is a British triathlete who won ITU Triathlon World Championships in 1993 and 1994.

response: During the 1990s he and rival Spencer Smith, were among some of the most successful athletes in Olympic distance triathlon. Lessing won the ITU Olympic Distance Triathlon World Championship in 1992, 1995, 1996, and 1998. In 1996, Lessing broke the Olympic distance triathlon world record with a time of 1 hour, 39 minutes, 50 seconds in 1996 at the ITU Triathlon World Championships in Cleveland.
*Spencer Smith (musician) (born 1987), American founding member and drummer of the band Panic! at the Disco
*Spencer Smith (Big Brother) (born 1979), contestant in Big Brother UK
*John Spencer Smith (1769–1845), British diplomat, politician and writer
